name: Stylish VilPro - Presets
description:
? Keep your current settings

? Save and load presets for your styles

? Left click on button for save, right click for load preset


? Look at the video how it works



Custom JavaScript for websites - Chrome extension link
obsoletion_message: Sorry, style is maintrance, try it again later please
additional_info:
Preset Buttons Script

/*======StylishPresets.js======*/window.StylishPresets=(function(){function stylishPresets(){var self=this;this.id=parseInt($('#style-id').html());this.settingsSave=function(cname){var settings={};$('#advancedsettings_area').find('select, input:not([type="file"])').each(function(){var type=$(this).attr('type');if(type=="radio"){settings[$(this).attr('id')]=$(this).is(':checked')}else{settings[$(this).attr('id')]=$(this).val()}});setCookie(cname,JSON.stringify(settings))};this.settingsLoad=function(cname){var settings=JSON.parse(getCookie(cname));$('#advancedsettings_area').find('select, input').each(function(){var input=$(this);var type=input.attr('type');var value=settings[input.attr('id')];if(type=="radio"){if(value===true)input.prop('checked',value)}else{if(typeof value=='string')value=value.replace('+','');input.val(value);if(typeof value=='string'&&value.match(/#[\w]+/gi)){var color_picker=input.closest('div').find('div div');var style_attr=color_picker.attr('style');color_picker.attr('style',style_attr.replace(/background:[^;]+/gi,'background:'+value))}}})};var addButtons=function(){$('#style-settings').prepend('<button id="preset-defaults"class="white_button"title="LMB\\RMB: Load defult settings"style="float:left">Default</button>'+([1,2,3].map(function(v){return'<button id="preset-'+self.id+'-'+v+'" class="white_button preset-btn" style="float:left"title="LMB: Save Preset\nRMB: Load Preset" >Preset '+v+'</button>'})).join(''))};var bindEvents=function(){$(document).on('click','.preset-btn',function(){if(confirm("Do You want to save "+$(this).html()+" ?")){settingsSave($(this).attr('id'))}});$(document).on('contextmenu','.preset-btn',function(e){e.preventDefault();settingsLoad($(this).attr('id'))});$(document).on('click','#update_style_button',function(){settingsSave('preset-'+self.id+'-current');setTimeout(function(){location.reload()},500)});$(document).on('click contextmenu','#preset-defaults',function(e){e.preventDefault();setCookie('preset-'+self.id+'-defaults','true');location.reload()})};var loadCurrent=function(){if(getCookie('preset-'+self.id+'-defaults')!='true')self.settingsLoad('preset-'+this.id+'-current');setCookie('preset-'+self.id+'-defaults',-1)};var setCookie=function(cname,cvalue,exdays){if(typeof exdays=='undefined')exdays=365;var d=(new Date());d.setTime(d.getTime()+(exdays*24*60*60*1000));var expires="expires="+d.toUTCString();document.cookie=cname+"="+cvalue+";"+expires+";path=/"};var getCookie=function getCookie(cname){var name=cname+"=";var ca=document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i<ca.length;i++){var c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)===' ')c=c.substring(1);if(c.indexOf(name)===0)return c.substring(name.length,c.length)}return""};addButtons();bindEvents();loadCurrent()}return stylishPresets})();$(document).ready(function(){StylishPresets()});
